path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Summer 24/Mental Health and Illness/Assignments/Mental Health Simulation Reflection.docx
text: Mental Health Simulation Reflection Answer the following questions and upload final document into D2L. Ensure that all answers are thorough and thoughtful. One sentence answers will not be accepted. What was your favorite part about the simulation experience? I thoroughly enjoy speaking to people about their lives and learning about their experiences. What was your least favorite part about the simulation experience? The emotional turmoil the patient expressed and having such a small-time frame to speak to him. What could you as the student have done to better prepare for the simulation experience? I am not sure What do you think as the student you can take from this experience to utilize in your practice? Be patient and present with every interaction
